actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow individuals to make tax-free withdrawals from eligible retirement plans for the purpose of acquiring their first homes.

summary.text: Homebuyer Savings Incentive Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income any payment or distribution from an eligible retirement plan for the purpose of acquiring a first home.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow individuals to make tax-free withdrawals from eligible retirement plans for the purpose of acquiring their first homes.
